question: One of the Key features of the National Rural Livelihood Mission is to ensure that there is a “Universal Social Mobilization” in India. How Universal Social Mobilization is proposed to be achieved in the NRLM?
option1: Making sure that money reaches to every beneficiary
option2: Making sure that target of 100% Rural population inclusion is achieved by 1916-17
option3: Making sure that at least one member from each rural poor household is brought under the Self Help Group (SHG)
option4: Making sure that at least one member from each rural poor household is brought under Self Employment Network
answer: Making sure that at least one member from each rural poor household is brought under the Self Help Group (SHG)
